name: awesome-notifications
description: Lightweight library for beautifull and smooth notifications

scripts.build: rimraf dist/* && webpack --mode production --progress --hide-modules && rimraf dist/style.js
scripts.dev: rimraf dist/* && webpack --mode development --progress --hide-modules && rimraf dist/style.js
scripts.buildDev: rimraf dist/* &&  webpack --mode production --hide-modules && rimraf dist/style.js && rimraf docs/dist/* && cpx dist/*.{js,css} docs/dist

author: David Yunevich
